name: Portfolio Website
description: This website is coded using ReactJS, and SASS for styling. It takes advantage of different libraries which required the ability to read documentation for other code.

name: Tweet Globe
description: This application is designed simply to stream tweets straight from the Twitter API. It works based on an authenticated user logging in and being able to see these tweets as they arrive. The current progress is applying authentication and retrieving tweets on the backend. This project is a work in progress.

name: 5G-Ensure
description: This project was worked on during my internship at IT Innovation Centre over the course of a year. I worked within a team to develop a ReactJS based diagram tool with the aim of providing a knowledge base of 5G assets, threats and controls. The source code is not available for this project.
